summary: The metropolis of Night City is a stage set to tell the tale of one individual, raised on the streets, who tries to lift...
caption: The metropolis of Night City is a stage set to tell the tale of one individual, raised on the streets, who tries to lift themself up from the gutter and find a way to survive amongst boostergangs and megacorporations in a city of filth and sin.

summary: El contenido de la edición estándar de Cyberpunk 2077 se filtró antes del E3 2019
title: El contenido de la edición estándar de Cyberpunk 2077 se filtró antes del E3 2019
body:
El contenido de la edición estándar de #Cyberpunk2077 se filtró antes del E3 2019

El E3 2019 está casi sobre nosotros y el contenido de la Edición estándar para Cyberpunk 2077 se acaba de filtrar. Por lo general, compartimos esas historias, sin embargo, estamos bastante seguros de que estás interesado en cada pequeño detalle con respecto al próximo RPG de CD Project RED.

Esta imagen se origina en el canal Discord de Cyberpunk 2077y parece ser legítima. La edición estándar…

summary: Aparece filtrada una de las ediciones de Cyberpunk 2077
title: Aparece filtrada una de las ediciones de Cyberpunk 2077
body:
Aparece filtrada una de las ediciones de Cyberpunk 2077

La conferencia de Microsoft en el E3 suscita gran parte del centro de atención de la feria angelina. Principalmente porque con la ausencia de Sony tienen gran parte de peso sobre sus hombros, porque nos están vendiendo un show largo y cargado de juegos, y porque mostrarán más de Cyberpunk 2077.

Se espera incluso que se de a conocer la fecha de lanzamiento del nuevo juego de CD Projekt RED.…

slug: codmwe3-2019-会場に巨大ポスター出現クローズドセッションやパネル以外の発表にも期待
summary: CoD:MW：E3 2019 会場に巨大ポスター出現、クローズドセッションやパネル以外の発表にも期待
title: CoD:MW：E3 2019 会場に巨大ポスター出現、クローズドセッションやパネル以外の発表にも期待
body:
すでに、Activision が E3 2019 へのブース出展を行わず、プレス向けのクローズドセッションのみ開催することが明らかとなっていた『Call of Duty: Modern Warfare（コール オブ デューティ モダン・ウォーフェア / CoD:MW）』ですが、E3会場に『CoD:MW』の巨大ポスターが登場。

すでに発表されているクローズドセッションと開発者のパネル以外にも、何かしらの発表が予定されているのではないかと話題になっています。
(more…)

View On WordPress

すでに発表されているクローズドセッションと開発者のパネル以外にも、何かしらの発表が予定されているのではないかと話題になっています。
(more…)

blog.name: biscuitreviews
blog.title: Biscuit Video Game Reviews
blog.description: Video game reviews and opinion pieces. Message me for review requests, questions, or if you would just like to geek out on video games!

title: Biscuit’s E3 2019 Hype
body:
E3 2019 is almost here and this year is looking to be interesting. Although this year there’s less titles that I’m looking forward to seeing. I think it’s because Sony has backed out of this year’s E3 and Last of Us II got delayed to 2020, but hey, at least Death Stranding has a release date now, so that’s something.

With that said, here are some of the titles that I’m looking forward to seeing more of in E3 2019

Cadence of Hyrule: Of all the Nintendo titles this is the one I’m the most interested in seeing. It’s Nintendo giving the Zelda IP to an indie company and I’m really curious to see what they come up with. I’m also interested to see if Nintendo will start giving more indie companies a chance to work on other Nintendo IPs and how well Cadence of Hyrule itself does. Also I’m hoping to see an actual release date. We know it’s coming in June, just not the day in June in which it’s coming out.

Final Fantasy 7 Remake: I have to admit, the trailer shown earlier seemed really interesting and I really want to see more from this. I’m more concerned with how fans will react to certain aspects, but with jumbled the FF7 canon has become I’m hoping this does straighten some things up.

The Avengers: Square Enix working on an Avengers video game. I’m really looking forward to seeing an official trailer or at least some gameplay for this title, especially with how well Spider-Man did last year.

Fire Emblem: Three Houses - Because it’s Fire Emblem. It’s all I need.

Borderlands 3: I’ll admit, I’m not too hyped about this one due to the Epic time exclusivity, but I would like to see more nonetheless, especially the other two playable vault hunters.

Outer Worlds: Same as Borderlands, not too hyped because again, Epic time exclusivity, but I would like to some gameplay to know more.

Splinter Cell: I wasn’t the biggest fan of the Splinter Cell series but I still had some fun with it. With Ubisoft bringing back this dormant franchise I’ll admit I do want to see if Ubisoft will keep to the series roots or turn it into every other Ubisoft game.

Doom Eternal: I really liked Doom 2016 and the reveal for this game last year was great and really screamed Doom. Being a badass space marine shooting demons, what more do you need.

Bethesda: I just really want to see how the crowd will react to them and how they’ll try to spin the mess that was Fallout 76.

Cyberpunk 2077: This is the game that I’m looking forward to the most. Honestly, this is probably THE game alot of people will be having their eyes on. With CD Projekt Red claiming this to be the most important E3 for Cyberpunk and with the supposed special edition and the box art leak, I foresee a release date announcement being very close. I still think it’s coming out in 2020 and I think this more of a Pre-Order now annoucement, but even then that has to show that signs are close on a release date annoucement. Also I’m hoping they release a full version of the “Chippin In” finally.
